commands.setup: python3 --version || echo "Error: Python 3 is not installed or not in PATH. Please install Python 3 and try again." python3 -m venv .venv || echo "Warning: Unable to create virtual environment. Proceeding with global installation." python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt python3 -m pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
commands.precommit: python3 -m ruff check --fix . python3 -m black --preview . python3 -m isort . python3 -m pyright python3 -m pytest
commands.tools:
pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY After installing a new dependency, update requirements.txt or dev-requirements.txt as appropriate
pytest -k $TEST_NAME Run a specific test or group of tests
pytest --cov=mentat Run tests with coverage report
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages
twine upload dist/* Upload distribution packages to PyPI (ensure you have the necessary credentials)
mentat Run the Mentat CLI tool (useful for manual testing)
